text: The President of the Chamber of Most Worthy Peers was the presiding officer of the upper house of the Cortes Gerais, the legislature of the Kingdom of Portugal during most of the constitutional monarchy period. The upper house was named the Chamber of Senators 1838 - 1842\. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center"• |- ! Portrait ! Name ! Tenure |- ! colspan="3"|The Chamber of Most Worthy Peers – Câmara dos Dignos Pares do Reino (1826 – 1828 / 1834 – 1836) |- | 80px | Nuno Caetano Álvares Pereira de Melo, 6.º Duque de Cadaval | 30 October 1826 – 14 March 1828 |- | 110px | Pedro de Sousa Holstein, 1.º Duque de Palmela | 14 August 1834 – 4 June 1836 |- ! title: List of Presidents of the Chamber of Most Worthy Peers (Kingdom of Portugal)
